title: Interpret given table - RGDP and NGDP - Years 1-3

content.prompt: Which of the following can be concluded from the data above?

choices.label: The base year for the price index was year 1.
The base year for the price index was year 3.
The economy was producing higher-quality goods and services in years 2 and 3 than in year 1.
The economy was experiencing inflation during years 2 and 3.
The economy was experiencing deflation during years 1, 2, and 3.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
